original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Iddhibalavagga
analyzed: iddhi bala vagga

original: 1. Katādhikārasaphalapañha
Atha kho milindo rājā katāvakāso nipacca garuno pāde sirasi añjaliṁ katvā etadavoca—
analyzed: atha khalu milindaḥ rājā kata avakāsaḥ nipacca garunaḥ pāde sirasi añjalim katvā etat avoca

original: “bhante nāgasena, ime titthiyā evaṁ bhaṇanti—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena ime titthiyāḥ evam bhaṇanti

original: ‘yadi buddho pūjaṁ sādiyati, na parinibbuto buddho saṁyutto lokena antobhaviko lokasmiṁ lokasādhāraṇo, tasmā tassa kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
analyzed: yadi buddhaḥ pūjam sādiyati na parinibbutaḥ buddhaḥ sayuttaḥ lokena antobhavikaḥ lokasmim loka sādhāraṇaḥ tasmā tassa kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ

original: Yadi parinibbuto visaṁyutto lokena nissaṭo sabbabhavehi, tassa pūjā nuppajjati, parinibbuto
analyzed: yadi parinibbutaḥ visa yuttaḥ lokena nissaṭaḥ sabba bhavehi tassa pūjā na uppajjati parinibbutaḥ

original: na kiñci sādiyati, asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti ubhato koṭiko
analyzed: na kiñci sādiyati a sādiyantassa kataḥ adhikāraḥ vañjhaḥ bhavati aphalo ti ubhatas koṭiko

original: eso pañho, neso visayo appattamānasānaṁ, mahantānaṁ yeveso visayo, bhindetaṁ diṭṭhijālaṁ
analyzed: eso pañho na iso visayo appattamānasānam mahantānam yā iva iso visayaḥ bhindetam diṭṭhi jāla

original: ekaṁse ṭhapaya, taveso pañho anuppatto, anāgatānaṁ jinaputtānaṁ cakkhuṁ dehi paravādaniggahāyā”ti.
analyzed: ekase ṭhapaya tava iso pañhaḥ an uppatto anāgatānam jinaputtānam cakkhum dehi paravāda niggahāya ati

original: Thero āha—
analyzed: theraḥ āha

original: “parinibbuto, mahārāja, bhagavā, na ca bhagavā pūjaṁ sādiyati, bodhimūleyeva tathāgatassa sādiyanā pahīnā, kiṁ pana anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa.
analyzed: parinibbutaḥ mahā rāja bhagavā na ca bhagavā pūjam sādiyati bodhi mūleya iva tathāgatassa sādiyanā pahīnā kim pana anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbutassa

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, therena sāriputtena dhammasenāpatinā—
analyzed: mahā rāja therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā

original: ‘Pūjiyantā asamasamā,
analyzed: asamasamā

original: sadevamānusehi te;
analyzed: sa deva mānusehi te

original: Na sādiyanti sakkāraṁ,
analyzed: na sādiyanti sakkāra

original: buddhānaṁ esa dhammatā’”ti.
analyzed: buddhānam esa dhamma tā ti

original: Rājā āha—
analyzed: rājā āha

original: “bhante nāgasena, putto vā pituno vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, pitā vā puttassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati,
analyzed: bhante nāgasena puttaḥ vā pituno vaṇṇam bhāsati pitā vā puttassa vaṇṇam bhāsati

original: na cetaṁ kāraṇaṁ paravādānaṁ niggahāya, pasādappakāsanaṁ nāmetaṁ, iṅgha me tvaṁ tattha
analyzed: na ca itam kāraṇam para vādānam niggahāya pasāda ppakāsanam nāma itas iṅgha me tvam tattha

original: kāraṇaṁ sammā brūhi sakavādassa patiṭṭhāpanāya diṭṭhijālaviniveṭhanāyā”ti.
analyzed: kāraṇam sammā brūhi saka vādassa patiṭṭhāpanāya diṭṭhi jāla viniveṭhanāya ati

original: Thero āha—
analyzed: theraḥ āha

original: “parinibbuto, mahārāja, bhagavā, na ca bhagavā pūjaṁ sādiyati, asādiyantasseva tathāgatassa
analyzed: parinibbutaḥ mahā rāja bhagavā na ca bhagavā pūjam sādiyati a sādiyantassa iva tathāgatassa

original: devamanussā dhāturatanaṁ vatthuṁ karitvā tathāgatassa ñāṇaratanārammaṇena sammāpaṭipattiṁ
analyzed: deva manussāḥ dhātu ratanam vatthum karitvā tathāgatassa ñāṇa ratana ārammaṇena sammā paṭipatti

original: sevantā tisso sampattiyo paṭilabhanti.
analyzed: sevantā tissaḥ sampattiyaḥ paṭilabhanti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahatimahāaggikkhandho pajjalitvā nibbāyeyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, mahāaggikkhandho sādiyati tiṇakaṭṭhupādānan”ti?
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahati mahā aggi khandhaḥ pajjalitvā nibbāyeyya api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja mahā aggi khandhaḥ sādiyati tiṇa kaṭṭhupādānam ti

original: “Jalamānopi so, bhante, mahāaggikkhandho tiṇakaṭṭhupādānaṁ na sādiyati, kiṁ pana nibbuto upasanto acetano sādiya”ti?
analyzed: jalamānaḥ api saḥ bhante mahā aggi khandho tiṇa kaṭṭhupādānam na sādiyati kim pana nibbutaḥ upasantaḥ acetano sādiyati

original: “Tasmiṁ pana, mahārāja, aggikkhandhe uparate upasante loke aggi suñño hotī”ti.
analyzed: tasmin pana mahā rāja aggi kkhandhe uparate upasante loke aggi suññaḥ hoti iti

original: “Na hi, bhante, kaṭṭhaṁ aggissa vatthu hoti upādānaṁ, ye keci manussā aggikāmā, te
analyzed: na hi bhante kaṭṭham aggissa vatthu hoti upādāna ye keci manussāḥ aggi kāmā te

original: attano thāmabalavīriyena paccattapurisakārena kaṭṭhaṁ manthayitvā aggiṁ nibbattetvā
analyzed: attanaḥ thāma bala vīriyena paccatta purisakārena kaṭṭham manthayitvā aggim nibbattetvā

original: tena agginā aggikaraṇīyāni kammāni karontī”ti.
analyzed: tena agginā aggi karaṇīyāni kammāni karonti iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, titthiyānaṁ vacanaṁ micchā bhavati ‘asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja titthiyānam vacanam micchā bhavati a sādiyantassa kataḥ adhikāraḥ vañjhaḥ bhavati aphalo ti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahatimahāaggikkhandho pajjali;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahati mahā aggi khandhaḥ

original: evameva bhagavā dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā buddhasiriyā pajjali.
analyzed: evam eva bhagavā dasa sahassiyā lokadhātuyā buddha siriyā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahatimahāaggikkhandho pajjalitvā nibbuto;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahati mahā aggi khandhaḥ pajjalitvā nibbutaḥ

original: evameva bhagavā dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā buddhasiriyā pajjalitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto.
analyzed: evam eva bhagavā dasa sahassiyā lokadhātuyā buddha siriyā pajjalitvā anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbutaḥ

original: Yathā, mahārāja, nibbuto aggikkhandho tiṇakaṭṭhupādānaṁ na sādiyati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja nibbutaḥ aggi kkhandhaḥ tiṇa kaṭṭhupādānam na sādiyati

original: evameva kho lokahitassa sādiyanā pahīnā upasantā.
analyzed: evam eva kho loka hitassa sādiyanā pahīnāḥ upasantā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, manussā nibbute aggikkhandhe anupādāne attano thāmabalavīriyena
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja manussāḥ nibbute aggi kkhandhe an upādāne attano thāma bala vīriyena

original: paccattapurisakārena kaṭṭhaṁ manthayitvā aggiṁ nibbattetvā tena agginā aggikaraṇīyāni kammāni karonti;
analyzed: paccatta purisakārena kaṭṭham manthayitvā aggim nibbattetvā tena agginā aggi karaṇīyāni kammāni karonti

original: evameva kho devamanussā tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhāturatanaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho deva manussāḥ tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva

original: vatthuṁ karitvā tathāgatassa ñāṇaratanārammaṇena sammāpaṭipattiṁ sevantā tisso sampattiyo
analyzed: vatthum karitvā tathāgatassa ñāṇa ratana ārammaṇena sammā paṭipattim sevantā tisso sampattiyo

original: paṭilabhanti, imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva
analyzed: paṭilabhanti iminā api mahā rāja kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva

original: kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
analyzed: kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahatimahāvāto vāyitvā uparameyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, uparato vāto sādiyati puna nibbattāpanan”ti?
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahati mahā vātaḥ vāyitvā uparameyya api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja uparataḥ vātaḥ sādiyati puna

original: “Na hi, bhante, uparatassa vātassa ābhogo vā manasikāro vā puna nibbattāpanāya”.
analyzed: na hi bhante uparatassa vātassa ābhogaḥ vā manasikāraḥ vā puna nibbattāpanāya

original: “Kiṅkāraṇaṁ”?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: “Acetanā sā vāyodhātū”ti.
analyzed: acetanā sā vāyodhātu uti

original: “Api nu tassa, mahārāja, uparatassa vātassa vātoti samaññā apagacchatī”ti?
analyzed: api nu tassa mahā rāja uparatassa vātassa vātoti samaññā apagacchati iti

original: “Na hi, bhante, tālavaṇṭavidhūpanāni vātassa uppattiyā paccayā, ye keci manussā uṇhābhitattā
analyzed: na hi bhante tāla vaṇṭa vidhūpanāni vātassa uppattiyāḥ paccayāḥ ye keci manussāḥ uṇha abhitattā

original: pariḷāhaparipīḷitā, te tālavaṇṭena vā vidhūpanena vā attano thāmabalavīriyena paccattapurisakārena
analyzed: pariḷāha paripīḍitā te tāla vaṇṭena vā vidhūpanena vā attano thāma bala vīriyena paccatta purisakārena

original: taṁ nibbattetvā tena vātena uṇhaṁ nibbāpenti pariḷāhaṁ vūpasamentī”ti.
analyzed: tam nibbattetvā tena vātena uṇham nibbāpenti pariḷāham vūpasamenti iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, titthiyānaṁ vacanaṁ micchā bhavati ‘asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja titthiyānam vacanam micchā bhavati a sādiyantassa kataḥ adhikāraḥ vañjhaḥ bhavati aphalo ti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahatimahāvāto vāyi;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahati mahā vātaḥ vāyi

original: evameva bhagavā dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā sītalamadhurasantasukhumamettāvātena upavāyi.
analyzed: evam eva bhagavā dasa sahassiyā lokadhātuyā sītala madhura santa sukhuma mettā vātena upavāyi

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahatimahāvāto vāyitvā uparato;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahati mahā vātaḥ vāyitvā uparataḥ

original: evameva bhagavā sītalamadhurasantasukhumamettāvātena upavāyitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto.
analyzed: evam eva bhagavā sītala madhura santa sukhuma mettā vātena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutaḥ

original: Yathā, mahārāja, uparato vāto puna nibbattāpanaṁ na sādiyati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja uparataḥ vātaḥ puna nibbattāpanam na sādiyati

original: evameva lokahitassa sādiyanā pahīnā upasantā.
analyzed: evam eva loka hitassa sādiyanā pahīnāḥ upasantā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, te manussā uṇhābhitattā pariḷāhaparipīḷitā;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja te manussāḥ uṇhā abhitattā pariḷāha paripīḍitā

original: evameva devamanussā tividhaggisantāpapariḷāhaparipīḷitā.
analyzed: evam eva deva manussā tividha aggi santāpa pariḷāha paripīḍitā

original: Yathā tālavaṇṭavidhūpanāni vātassa nibbattiyā paccayā honti;
analyzed: yathā tāla vaṇṭa vidhūpanāni vātassa nibbattiyā paccayāḥ honti

original: evameva tathāgatassa dhātu ca ñāṇaratanañca paccayo hoti tissannaṁ sampattīnaṁ paṭilābhāya.
analyzed: evam eva tathāgatassa dhātu ca ñāṇa ratanañca paccayaḥ hoti tissannam sampattīnam paṭilābhāya

original: Yathā manussā uṇhābhitattā pariḷāhaparipīḷitā tālavaṇṭena vā vidhūpanena vā vātaṁ nibbattetvā uṇhaṁ nibbāpenti pariḷāhaṁ vūpasamenti;
analyzed: yathā manussāḥ uṇha abhitattā pariḷāha paripīḷitā tālavaṇṭena vā vidhūpanena vā vātam nibbattetvā uṇham nibbāpenti pariḷāham vūpasamenti

original: evameva devamanussā tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhātuñca ñāṇaratanañca pūjetvā kusalaṁ nibbattetvā tena kusalena tividhaggisantāpapariḷāhaṁ nibbāpenti vūpasamenti.
analyzed: evam eva deva manussā tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva dhātuñca ñāṇa ratanañca pūjetvā kusalam nibbattetvā tena kusalena tividha aggi santāpa pariḷāham nibbāpenti vūpasamenti

original: Imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
analyzed: iminā api mahā rāja kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati saphalaḥ ti

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi paravādānaṁ niggahāya.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi paravādānam niggahāya

original: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso bheriṁ ākoṭetvā saddaṁ nibbatteyya, yo so bherisaddo purisena
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ bherim ākoṭetvā saddam nibbatteyya yaḥ saḥ bheri saddaḥ purisena

original: nibbattito, so saddo antaradhāyeyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, saddo sādiyati puna nibbattāpanan”ti?
analyzed: nibbattitaḥ saḥ saddaḥ antaradhāyeyya api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja saddaḥ sādiyati puna

original: “Na hi, bhante, antarahito so saddo, natthi tassa puna uppādāya ābhogo vā manasikāro vā, sakiṁ nibbatte bherisadde antarahite so bherisaddo samucchinno hoti.
analyzed: na hi bhante antarahitaḥ saḥ saddaḥ natthi tassa puna uppādāya ābhogaḥ vā manasikāraḥ vā sakim nibbatte bheri sadde antarahite saḥ bheri saddo samucchinnaḥ hoti

original: Bherī pana, bhante, paccayo hoti saddassa nibbattiyā, atha puriso paccaye sati attajena vāyāmena bheriṁ akoṭetvā saddaṁ nibbattetī”ti.
analyzed: bherī pana bhante paccayaḥ hoti saddassa nibbattiyā atha puriso paccaye sati atta jena vāyāmena bherim a koṭetvā saddam nibbatteti iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, bhagavā sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanaparibhāvitaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja bhagavā sīla samādhi paññā vimutti vimutti ñāṇa dassana paribhāvita

original: dhāturatanañca dhammañca vinayañca anusiṭṭhañca satthāraṁ ṭhapayitvā sayaṁ anupādisesāya
analyzed: dhāturatanam ca dhammañca vinayañca anusiṭṭhañca satthāram ṭhapayitvā sayam an upādisesāya

original: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto, na ca parinibbute bhagavati sampattilābho upacchinno
analyzed: nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbutaḥ na ca parinibbute bhagavati sampatti lābhaḥ upacchinnaḥ

original: hoti, bhavadukkhapaṭipīḷitā sattā dhāturatanañca dhammañca vinayañca anusiṭṭhañca
analyzed: hoti bhava dukkha paṭipīḍitā sattā dhātu ratanañca dhammañca vinayañca anusiṭṭhañca

original: paccayaṁ karitvā sampattikāmā sampattiyo paṭilabhanti, imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena
analyzed: paccayam karitvā sampatti kāmāḥ sampattiyaḥ paṭilabhanti iminā api mahā rāja kāraṇena

original: tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
analyzed: tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati saphalaḥ ti

original: Diṭṭhañcetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā anāgatamaddhānaṁ.
analyzed: diṭṭham ca ita mahā rāja bhagavatā anāgata maddhāna

original: Kathitañca bhaṇitañca ācikkhitañca ‘siyā kho panānanda, tumhākaṁ evamassa atītasatthukaṁ
analyzed: kathitam ca bhaṇitam ca ācikkhitam ca siyā kho pana ānanda tumhākam evam assa atīta satthuka

original: pāvacanaṁ natthi no satthāti, na kho panetaṁ, ānanda, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, yo vo, ānanda,
analyzed: na atthi no satthā ati na kho pana itas ānanda evam daṭṭhabba yaḥ vaḥ ānanda

original: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā’ti.
analyzed: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto saḥ vaḥ mamaccayena satthā ati

original: Parinibbutassa tathāgatassa asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphaloti,
analyzed: parinibbutassa tathāgatassa a sādiyantassa kataḥ adhikāraḥ vañjhaḥ bhavati aphalo ti

original: taṁ tesaṁ titthiyānaṁ vacanaṁ micchā abhūtaṁ vitathaṁ alikaṁ viruddhaṁ viparītaṁ
analyzed: tam tesam titthiyānam vacanam micchā abhūtam vitatham alikam viruddham

original: dukkhadāyakaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ apāyagamanīyanti.
analyzed: dukkha dāyakam dukkha vipākam apāya gamanīyanti

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ

original: Sādiyati nu kho, mahārāja, ayaṁ mahāpathavī ‘sabbabījāni mayi saṁviruhantū’”ti?
analyzed: sādiyati nu khalu mahā rāja ayam mahā pathavī sabba bījāni mayi sa viruhantu uti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kissa pana tāni, mahārāja, bījāni asādiyantiyā mahāpathaviyā saṁviruhitvā daḷhamūlajaṭāpatiṭṭhitā khandhasārasākhāparivitthiṇṇā pupphaphaladharā hontī”ti?
analyzed: kissa pana tāni mahā rāja bījāni asādiyantiyā mahā pathaviyā daḷha mūla jaṭā patiṭṭhitā khandha sāra sākhā parivitthiṇṇā puppha phala dharā honti iti

original: “Asādiyantīpi, bhante, mahāpathavī tesaṁ bījānaṁ vatthu hoti paccayaṁ deti viruhanāya,
analyzed: asādiyantī ipi bhante mahā pathavī tesam bījānam vatthu hoti paccayam deti viruhanāya

original: tāni bījāni taṁ vatthuṁ nissāya tena paccayena saṁviruhitvā daḷhamūlajaṭāpatiṭṭhitā
analyzed: tāni bījāni tam vatthum nissāya tena paccayena sa viruhitvā daḷha mūla jaṭā patiṭṭhitā

original: khandhasārasākhāparivitthiṇṇā pupphaphaladharā hontī”ti.
analyzed: khandha sāra sākhā parivitthiṇṇā puppha phala dharāḥ honti iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, titthiyā sake vāde naṭṭhā honti hatā viruddhā, sace te bhaṇanti—
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja titthiyā sake vāde naṭṭhāḥ honti hatā viruddhā sace te bhaṇanti

original: ‘asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti.
analyzed: a sādiyantassa kataḥ adhikāraḥ vañjhaḥ bhavati aphalo ti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahāpathavī, evaṁ tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahā pathavī evam tathāgataḥ araham sammāsambuddhaḥ

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahāpathavī na kiñci sādiyati, evaṁ tathāgato na kiñci sādiyati.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahā pathavī na kiñci sādiyati evam tathāgataḥ na kiñci sādiyati

original: Yathā, mahārāja, tāni bījāni pathaviṁ nissāya saṁviruhitvā daḷhamūlajaṭāpatiṭṭhitā
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja tāni bījāni pathavim nissāya sa viruhitvā daḷha mūla jaṭā patiṭṭhitā

original: khandhasārasākhāparivitthiṇṇā pupphaphaladharā honti, evaṁ devamanussā tathāgatassa
analyzed: khandha sāra sākhā parivitthiṇṇā puppha phala dharāḥ honti evam deva manussā tathāgatassa

original: parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhātuñca ñāṇaratanañca nissāya daḷhakusalamūlapatiṭṭhitā
analyzed: parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva dhātuñca ñāṇa ratanañca nissāya daḷha kusala mūla patiṭṭhitā

original: samādhikkhandhadhammasārasīlasākhāparivitthiṇṇā vimuttipupphasāmaññaphaladharā honti,
analyzed: samādhi kkhandha dhamma sāra sīla sākhā parivitthiṇṇāḥ vimutti puppha sāmañña phala dharāḥ honti

original: imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro
analyzed: iminā api mahā rāja kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ

original: avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
analyzed: avañjhaḥ bhavati

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ

original: Sādiyanti nu kho, mahārāja, ime oṭṭhā goṇā gadrabhā ajā pasū manussā antokucchismiṁ kimikulānaṁ sambhavan”ti?
analyzed: sādiyanti nu khalu mahā rāja ime oṭṭhāḥ goṇāḥ gadrabhāḥ ajā pasū manussāḥ antokucchismim kimikulānam sambhavanti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kissa pana te, mahārāja, kimayo tesaṁ asādiyantānaṁ antokucchismiṁ sambhavitvā bahuputtanattā vepullataṁ pāpuṇantī”ti?
analyzed: kissa pana te mahā rāja tesam asādiyantānam antokucchismim sambhavitvā bahu putta nattāḥ vepulla tam pāpuṇanti iti

original: “Pāpassa, bhante, kammassa balavatāya asādiyantānaṁyeva tesaṁ sattānaṁ antokucchismiṁ kimayo sambhavitvā bahuputtanattā vepullataṁ pāpuṇantī”ti.
analyzed: pāpassa bhante kammassa balava tāya tesam sattānam antokucchismim sambhavitvā bahu putta nattāḥ vepulla tam pāpuṇanti iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhātussa ca ñāṇārammaṇassa ca balavatāya tathāgate kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva dhātussa ca ñāṇa ārammaṇassa ca balavatāya tathāgate kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ ti

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ

original: Sādiyanti nu kho, mahārāja, ime manussā ime aṭṭhanavuti rogā kāye nibbattantū”ti?
analyzed: sādiyanti nu kho mahā rāja ime manussāḥ ime aṭṭhanavuti rogā kāye nibbattantu uti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kissa pana te, mahārāja, rogā asādiyantānaṁ kāye nipatantī”ti?
analyzed: kissa pana te mahā rāja rogāḥ asādiyantānam kāye nipatanti iti

original: “Pubbe katena, bhante, duccaritenā”ti.
analyzed: pubbe katena bhante duccaritena ati

original: “Yadi, mahārāja, pubbe kataṁ akusalaṁ idha vedanīyaṁ hoti, tena hi, mahārāja, pubbe katampi idha katampi kusalākusalaṁ kammaṁ avañjhaṁ bhavati saphalanti.
analyzed: yadi mahā rāja pubbe katam akusalam idha vedanīyam hoti tena hi mahā rāja pubbe katam api idha katam pi kusala akusalam kammam avañjham bhavati sa phalanti

original: Imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
analyzed: iminā api mahā rāja kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati saphalaḥ ti

original: Sutapubbaṁ pana tayā, mahārāja, nandako nāma yakkho theraṁ sāriputtaṁ āsādayitvā pathaviṁ paviṭṭho”ti?
analyzed: suta pubbam pana tayā mahā rāja nandakaḥ nāma yakkhaḥ theram sāriputtam āsādayitvā pathavim paviṭṭhaḥ ti

original: “Āma, bhante, suyyati, loke pākaṭo eso”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante suyyati loke pākaṭaḥ esaḥ iti

original: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, thero sāriputto sādiyi nandakassa yakkhassa mahāpathavigilanan”ti.
analyzed: api nu kho mahā rāja theraḥ sāriputto sādiyi nandakassa yakkhassa

original: “Ubbattiyantepi, bhante, sadevake loke patamānepi chamāyaṁ candimasūriye vikirantepi sinerupabbatarāje thero sāriputto na parassa dukkhaṁ sādiyeyya.
analyzed: ubbattiyante api bhante sa devake loke patamāne api cha māyam candima sūriye vikirante api sineru pabbata rāje theraḥ sāriputto na parassa dukkham sādiyeyya

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Yena hetunā thero sāriputto kujjheyya vā dusseyya vā, so hetu therassa sāriputtassa
analyzed: yena hetunā theraḥ sāriputto kujjheyya vā dusseyya vā saḥ hetu therassa sāriputtassa

original: samūhato samucchinno, hetuno samugghātitattā, bhante, thero sāriputto jīvitahārakepi
analyzed: samūhataḥ samucchinnaḥ hetuno samugghātita ttā bhante theraḥ sāriputto jīvita hārake pi

original: kopaṁ na kareyyā”ti.
analyzed: kopam na kareyyāti

original: “Yadi, mahārāja, thero sāriputto nandakassa yakkhassa pathavigilanaṁ na sādiyi, kissa pana nandako yakkho pathaviṁ paviṭṭho”ti?
analyzed: yadi mahā rāja theraḥ sāriputtaḥ nandakassa yakkhassa pathavi gilanam na sādiyi kissa pana nandakaḥ yakkhaḥ pathavim paviṭṭhaḥ ti

original: “Akusalassa, bhante, kammassa balavatāyā”ti.
analyzed: akusalassa bhante kammassa balavatāya ati

original: “Yadi, mahārāja, akusalassa kammassa balavatāya nandako yakkho pathaviṁ paviṭṭho, asādiyantassāpi kato aparādho avañjho bhavati saphalo.
analyzed: yadi mahā rāja akusalassa kammassa balavatāya nandakaḥ yakkhaḥ pathavim paviṭṭhaḥ a sādiyantassa api kataḥ aparādhaḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ

original: Tena hi, mahārāja, akusalassapi kammassa balavatāya asādiyantassa kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja akusalassa api kammassa balavatāya a sādiyantassa kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ ti

original: Imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
analyzed: iminā api mahā rāja kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati saphalaḥ ti

original: Kati nu kho te, mahārāja, manussā, ye etarahi mahāpathaviṁ paviṭṭhā, atthi te tattha savaṇan”ti?
analyzed: kati nu kho te mahā rāja manussāḥ ye etarahi mahā pathavim paviṭṭhāḥ atthi te tattha

original: “Āma, bhante, suyyatī”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante suyyati iti

original: “Iṅgha tvaṁ, mahārāja, sāvehī”ti?
analyzed: iṅgha tva mahā rāja sā avehi iti

original: “Ciñcamāṇavikā, bhante, suppabuddho ca sakko, devadatto ca thero, nandako ca yakkho, nando ca māṇavakoti.
analyzed: ciñcamāṇavikā bhante suppabuddhaḥ ca sakkaḥ devadatto ca theraḥ nandako ca yakkhaḥ nando ca māṇavako ti

original: Sutametaṁ, bhante, ime pañca janā mahāpathaviṁ paviṭṭhā”ti.
analyzed: sutam eta bhante ime pañca janāḥ mahā pathavim

original: “Kismiṁ te, mahārāja, aparaddhā”ti?
analyzed: kismin te mahā rāja

original: “Bhagavati ca, bhante, sāvakesu cā”ti.
analyzed: bhagavati ca bhante sāvakesu ca ati

original: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, bhagavā vā sāvakā vā sādiyiṁsu imesaṁ mahāpathavipavisanan”ti?
analyzed: api nu khalu mahā rāja bhagavā vā sāvakāḥ vā

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo”ti.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja tathāgatassa parinibbutassa a sādiyantassa iva kataḥ adhikāraḥ avañjhaḥ bhavati sa phalaḥ ti

original: “Suviññāpito, bhante nāgasena, pañho gambhīro uttānīkato, guyhaṁ vidaṁsitaṁ, gaṇṭhi
analyzed: su viññāpitaḥ bhante nāgasena pañhaḥ gambhīraḥ utta anīkataḥ guyham vidasita gaṇṭhi

original: bhinno, gahanaṁ agahanaṁ kataṁ, naṭṭhā paravādā, bhaggā kudiṭṭhī, nippabhā jātā kutitthiyā,
analyzed: bhinnaḥ gahanam agahanam naṭṭhā paravādā bhaggā kudiṭṭhī nippabhā jātā kutitthiyā

original: tvaṁ gaṇivarapavaramāsajjā”ti.
analyzed: tvam gaṇi vara pavaram āsajjāti

original: Katādhikārasaphalapañho paṭhamo.
analyzed: kata adhikāra sa phala pañhaḥ paṭhamaḥ
